name: vscode-rpg-folding
description: Extension that recognizes and makes foldable logic blocks in RPG and RPGLE, such as IF/ENDIF (all types of IF), DO/ENDDO, BEGSR/ENDSR, and more.

rpgFolding.enableFreeFormFallback.description: Enable free-form fallback, deprecated use another extension for free-form RPGLE folding.

rpgFolding.highlight.colorPickerInfo.markdownDescription: Accedi al [selettore colori](https://www.google.com/search?q=selettore+colori) per selezionare un colore; poi incolla il codice hex nelle impostazioni colore dell'estensione.
rpgFolding.highlight.colorPickerInfo.description: Informazione: apre un link esterno per ottenere un codice colore hex da incollare nelle impostazioni.

rpgFolding.highlight.enable.description: Enable persistent highlighting of RPG block keywords (start/end/else).

rpgFolding.highlight.blockKeywordColor.description: Color used for block keywords (start/end) in hex. Default: mustard yellow.

rpgFolding.highlight.elseColor.description: Color used for ELSE/ELSEIF lines in hex. Default: light orange.

rpgFolding.highlight.matchLineColor.description: Color used to highlight matching start/end lines when the cursor is on a block keyword (light translucent blue).

rpgFolding.highlight.matchElseLineColor.description: Color used to highlight ELSE/ELSEIF lines of the matched IF when the cursor is on that IF (light translucent orange).

rpgFolding.highlight.callColor.description: Colore per la keyword CALL/CALLP (foreground, viola di default)
